column1: william claar| william claar. died: june 12
column6: 2015 at the kobacker house. bill grew up in jackson
column7: oh. he is a longtime employee of worthington industries. preceded in death by parents
column8: william and myrtle claar. survived by daughter
column10: daniel and kyle catcher and their little sibling on the way; sister
column12: teresa rollings and tonya swan; great nephews
column13: billy rollings and todd swan. a celebration of bill's life will be held at a later date. bill's family encourages memorial contributions in his memory be made to home. reach hospice - kobacker house or the american cancer society. arrangements with the tidd family funeral home. send sympathy card print name location email personal message hide emailenter personal message here too difficult to read? reload. type the text in order submit guest book entry .
